training_in_progress: Training already in progress, it should take an hour.
error_unzip: There was an error while unzipping the file, please check the file and try again.
error_zip_contains_other_files: The zip file contains files that are not images. Images must be in .png, .jpg or .jpeg format
error_wrong_token: The token is incorrect. Please try again.
error_wrong_credentials: The credentials are incorrect. Please try again.
error_accept_conditions: Please accept the conditions of use for the model, https://huggingface.co/stabilityai/stable-diffusion-2
error_unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
ok_download: The model has been downloaded successfully. Now you have to wait 5 minutes for the web app to be ready.
